c:attribute.name: camera
c:attribute.description: The address of the associated camera.

c:attribute.name: state
c:attribute.description: An *estimate* of the current state of the camera. This should be used for displaying metadata not as a guarantee that prevents new recordings / streams from being attempted.

c:attribute.name: lastRecording
c:attribute.description: Address of the last recording completed by the camera. This will be the empty string in the following cases: - Camera has never completed a recording - The most recent recording has been deleted by the user

c:attribute.name: lastRecordingTime
c:attribute.description: Start time of the last recording that has completed for this camera. Note it will not be updated until the current recording completes. Also it may contain a time for a non-existent recording if the user has deleted the most recent recording.

c:attribute.name: activeRecording
c:attribute.description: The address of the video that the camera is currently streaming / recording.
